name: epicurus
text:
This is such a wierd story arc but I ended up getting into it.

No brain tumors exactly

name: rosie
text: Molly is a crafty DIY queen. Awesome. She and Beef are so awesome together.

name: mastronaut
text: I totally forgot that it was Molly who made these and what the original reasoning was. This makes it even more brilliant.

name: davidadam
text: This is one of my favorite story arcs.

name: syrinx
text: This is the first Achewood story arc I read.  I was flabbergasted, but hooked.

name: bozendoka
text: I was in the same position, and had the same reaction.

name: theyang
text: ditto here

name: centipede_damascus
text: The whole story arc is manufactured out of pure magic mined from the valleys of Avalon itself.

name: nathanielperson
text: Mmm, lycopene.

name: saint
text: I'd be uncomfortable dipping fries that close to my package.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
When you sit down at a table, and there's ketchup on the table? It's probably not that much further away.

Be more comfortable with your dick, saint.

name: fuzzyshoo
text: I do not recommend putting lycopene rich ketchup in there.

name: luckyg
text: Molly is a lady who Cares.

name: joeyramoney
text: i love molly's stockings.

name: keithcozz
text: Depressingly enough, ain't none of us ever gonna score us a Molly.  Beef 'n Molly could live a thousand years, they will still smile at each other.

name: alphagator
text:
sorry to disagree doggie but my girl is a doctor who gave me a children's book about dinosaurs falling in love

never give up hope

name: molesticide
text:
my girl buys me sub sandwiches by surprise and helped me steal a car once.

never give up hope.

name: soticoto
text:
My girl plays Resident Evil and Dynasty Warriors.

Never give up hope.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
What the dang crap, guys?! All these years I have been that girl , and only now do I find out there's actually a demand for it?

Man what in the hell.

name: dj_insomniac
text: Oh hell and damn yes. A demand, indeed.

name: morypcaina
text: You just gotta find the men who want that girl. Go door to door if you have to, and the right man will appreciate it

name: atticusonline
text: Look...if you're the kind of girl that would date soticoto, then I won't be able to feel sorry for you when you wake up one day to him dancing in a mini-skirt with your intestines draped around his neck like a scarf and him barking at you playfully.

name: tekende
text: Holy shit. Perfect.

name: unsentletter
text:
sigh...

Never give up hope.

name: straw
text: Man, that's the real shit. I had a Molly but let her go.  Gotta get perspective, man.  Gotta know a Thing.

name: jhunter
text:
my girl surfed me down the stairs like a human boogie-board and I was weeping all the while.

Okay so my girlfriend is less of a Molly and more of a Lyle

name: fuzzyshoo
text: chubby for the rhyme, and for some reason i hear johnny cash singing this.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: This strip should be etched into stone so that all will know its greatness.

name: nicolae
text: Lycopene-rich ketchup huzzah!

name: jackparsons
text:
alt: Stitched with copper wire, lined with thick jersey cotton, these underpants have a tare weight of 12 ozs.

He got me with 'tare weight'.

name: saru
text: We all have friends like this, ones with a girl, whom even though they have troubles with, have these perfect, utterly sweet (utterly geeky) moments, that it just makes you tear up, wondering if you'll ever have anything as special.

name: grandpayum
text: lycopene!

name: charchar
text: I'm considering adopting Molly as my role model. But Robert Ripley has served me well these last ten years. What to doooo?

name: velveteen
text:
Want.

No wait.

NEED.

...we needs it.

name: atticusonline
text: why has no one mae a concept of this!?!

name: radarjammer
text:
I want a girl like Molly.

Scratch that it's not possible. I want Molly. Sorry.

name: tekende
text: So go to the pound, adopt a cat, and name her Molly. There you go.

name: tekende
text: Also: yiff in hell, fur <strike>fag</strike> ry!

name: goatmasterflash
text: Molly's gonna feel kinda awful when Beef develops Alzheimer's of the ding-a-ling from aluminum leeching into his junk - all having to feed Beef's ding-a-ling lukewarm mush with a padded spoon after it no longer remembers how to get mad rutty or not piss on itself.

name: boredom_man
text: If it's wrong for this thought to bring chubbies, I don't want to be right.

name: tekende
text: Okay, last panel: the word "dippin'"--is Beef using it as a verb or an adjective? What's your perspective?

name: ham_shoes
text: My perspective is that you shouldn't do anything that looks like dipping french fries into your peehole and then eating them.  Even when you're all alone.  Just... just don't.

name: hamscout
text:
I just don't want to answer the phone later, and accidentally let slip that I am rinsing dippin' sauce out of my ding-a-ling armature cup.

My ding-a-ling, my ding-a-ling,
I want to play with my ding-a-ling-a-ling.
-Chuck Berry

name: sarsbar
text: The one time I see these two getting along and this is what happens...

name: vermy
text: What about the sodium in the fries, beef?
